alert.note: Alert for Sequoia NP; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:09PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tulare County through 645 PM PDT... At 607 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles east of Three Rivers, or 26 miles west of Olancha, staying nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kern Canyon Ranger Station, Quinn Patrol Cabin, Camp Nelson and Wet Meadows. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Sequoia NP; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra
